text: Per Carlsen (1948 â€“ December 2020) was a Danish politician. He was the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Kingdom of Denmark to Latvia from 2010 through 2015. Before 2010 he was the Danish ambassador to the Russian Federation. Carlsen died in December 2020 in Copenhagen at the age of 72.Ambassador Per Carlsen obituary ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ambassadors to Russia Category:Politicians from Copenhagen
title: Per Carlsen (diplomat)
